[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span(
            1,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    DoWhile(
        DoWhileStatement {
            do: Span(
                2,
                1,
            ),
            body: Block(
                Braced {
                    left_brace: Span(
                        2,
                        4,
                    ),
                    inner: [
                        Echo {
                            echo: Span(
                                3,
                                5,
                            ),
                            values: [
                                LiteralString {
                                    span: Span(
                                        3,
                                        10,
                                    ),
                                    value: "Hi!",
                                },
                            ],
                            ending: Semicolon(
                                Span(
                                    3,
                                    15,
                                ),
                            ),
                        },
                    ],
                    right_brace: Span(
                        4,
                        1,
                    ),
                },
            ),
            while: Span(
                4,
                3,
            ),
            condition: SemicolonTerminated {
                inner: Parenthesized {
                    left_parenthesis: Span(
                        4,
                        9,
                    ),
                    inner: Bool {
                        value: true,
                    },
                    right_parenthesis: Span(
                        4,
                        14,
                    ),
                },
                semicolon: Span(
                    4,
                    15,
                ),
            },
        },
    ),
]
